metadata.name: Local System Accounts Discovery - MacOs
metadata.comment: Detects enumeration of local systeam accounts on MacOS

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/dscl')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('list')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/users')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/dscacheutil')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-q')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('user')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('''x:0:''')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/cat')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/etc/passwd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/etc/sudoers'))) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/id')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/lsof')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-u'))))

output.summary: Detects enumeration of local systeam accounts on MacOS

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1087.001/T1087.001.md
